name: Empowered Mining
description:
enhances Energetic Harvesting with additional Mining effects.

1 Harvest Pip: Gain Empowered Mining increasing Mining by 5% while Energetic Harvest is active.

2 Harvest Pips: Gain Perceptive Mining increasing Spot Weakness: Ore by 5% while Perceptive Harvest is active.

3 Harvest Pips: Increase Stamina restore amount by 4.

4 Harvest Pips: Gain Heightened Mining increasing the effectiveness of Energetic Harvest, Perceptive Harvest, and Stamina restore effects gained in the next 7 seconds when Heightened Harvest is active.

5 Harvest Pips: Gain Furious Mining increasing Harvest Base Damage: Ore by 30 for 6 seconds or 2 hits, whichever comes first when Furious Reaping is active.
shortDescription: Passive: Adds Mining specific Buffs to all Energetic Harvesting Buffs
